root.name: Grandia: Parallel Trippers
root.description: Overview Grandia: Parallel Trippers is a role-playing game for the Game Boy Color. It was developed by Game Arts and published by Hudson Soft in Japan only; it was released there on December 22, 2000. It is the only entry in the Grandia series to appear on a handheld console (excluding the PSN version of Grandia) or a Nintendo console. The game does utilize a real-time battle system reminiscent of the one featured in Grandia.
